summary: You know how when a couple become parents and then they're real names just sort of disappear and they end up just "mom" and...
body: You know how when a couple become parents and then they’re real names just sort of disappear and they end up just “mom” and “dad” to each other? Well, i have this headcanon that as soon as Pepperony become parents, they’re barely going to call each other “Pepper” or “Tony” but as “Mom” and “Dad.”

title: Only one
body:
Ask - @carolyn-stark-91 Can you write a tony x short!reader ( like 5ft exact or something like that) where the reader is related to Steve or Peggy some how. I was thinking they meet at one of his parties or down in his workshop ( and maybe she could be his assistant? It’s up to you). And surprise me with it being smut or not. And if you do write it, please tag me.

Sure thing!! I’m so sorry it took so long, I really wanted to do justice to my first Tony fic but here it is!! Hope you enjoy (:

Summary - On the most nights that Tony can’t sleep, he usually wanders down to his workshop to tinker and build something and nap there but after one particularly extraordinary dream, will he ever sleep the same again?

Word count - 1.8k

Warnings - Fluff, so much fluff, slight SMUT, baby-talk, feels

Song - Only one by Kanye West

M A S T E R L I S T

As I lay me down to sleep,

I hear her speak to me

In the silence of the night within the grand mansion, the sound of clattering metal pierced the silence like a needle and woke you up from your lonely slumber in the grand king sized bed.

The four am usuals, that’s what you knew this to be. You knew Tony had some serious sleeping issues that he never entirely treated alongside his PTSD and knew the usual tinkering in the office-come-workshop was because of his brain going into overdrive.

To salvage what was left of Tony, you slid on your dressing gown and slippers and padded down the landing and stairway in record time whilst keeping Morgan - yours and Tony’s daughter - sleeping soundly in the nursery. The sound of the clattering continued as you turned a corner and neared the doorway of his office, the worry that lurked in your stomach making you squirm as you put your four digit code in the lock.

“Tony?” You called out timidly as soon as the door swung open. Your eyes bulged out at the mess that had been left around the modern office, metal scraps, bolts, hammers, screws and anything else mechanical were strewn around the room - the room genuinely looked like it had been hit by a tornado of some sorts.

Hello Tony, how you doing?

I think the storm’s run out of rain

The clouds are moving

Central of the calamity of a room sat a sullen and exhausted looking Tony, his back slumped on the tiny wheeled stool and raced away from you. You called his name again and touched his shoulder lightly and tenderly, the contact making him shoot out of his chair and whip around to look at you with wet bloodshot eyes.

“Honey what’s wrong? What happened? Did you have a nightmare?” Like always, the usual worries spilled out of your mouth making Tony sigh and sit back down in the little stool, his back nestled to your stomach for safety.

“No, nothing like that..” Tony mumbled and ran his hands through his stressed hair.

I know you’re happy

Cause I can see it

So tell the voice inside your head to believe it

“Then what happened Tony?” You sighed into his neck as you hugged his relatively muscular shoulders, knowing the contact would do someone as touch starved as himself some good.

“I saw her…” Tony’s voice trembled in a short breath. “My mom, I saw her in my dream.” A slight panic was setting in when you thought about Tony talking to dead, as if he was going to join them soon. “She—she spoke to me..” A hiccup escaped his parched lips, tears slowly making a reappearance in his eyes; the pain of being reminded of loved ones shared but he both of you

I talked to god about you

He said he sent you an angel

Being the second cousin of the now-fugitive Captain America made you susceptible to these kind of dreams too, the belief that one day you two could reconnect seemingly impossible as soon as you let him and he rebuffed any of your attempts to get to know him - but the dreams still continued even if the reality of knowing your wider family was impossible.

“What’d she say honey?” You cooed and began to massage the tense muscles of Tony’s shoulders, his breathing picking up at the thought of confessing what his mother said. “You don’t have to say anything if you don’t want Tony, take your time.” You sensed his uneasiness from the second it started and eased him soothingly.

Look at all he gave you
You asked for one now you got two

“She said she spoke to god about me…” Tony began to mumble in an astonished tone and rubbed his forehead tiresomely. “She spoke about you and Morgan too..” At the mention of your name, your heart felt as if it had stopped being for a second or two.

“All good things I hope?” You laughed nervously and slowed your massage on Tony’s shoulders, to which they shook with his laugh. “Hey, I wanna know if I made a good impression or not.” His laugh only continued to grow at your explanation and made you cower into the name of his neck in slight shame.

As strange as it seemed looking back, your knack of embarrassing yourself was one of things that drew him into you when you signed up to be his new assistant after Pepper had left three years ago.

Maybe it was the way you could break the ice easily and non-uncomfortably between you and Tony when you first met that made him like you even more, he had to give it to you back then - he was an absolute douche of a mess after proper had left him for good.

In Tony’s eyes, you certainly didn’t compare to Pepper in any shape or form and he reminded you of that front the get-go; your only release being Happy as he drove you home from the torturous tower in the cold wet winter nights.

Both your new boss and your newly discovered second cousin hated your existence already and you couldn’t take it, so you snapped - more at Tony than Steve - and tearily swore you couldn’t deal with the comparison game and constant coldness much more.

It was that moment Tony had never seen such a beautiful woman before, tears streaming down her cheeks or not, you were just stunning; wounded but stunning. And much to his reputation, he told you that exactly and made you laugh pathetically that he found your ugly cry was beautiful.

From that day on, the rest was history and you soon became his fiancée after birthing him his first child a little over a year ago - a little after the Accords drama.

“And yes Y/N,” Tony turned and nestled himself into your touch, his head finding comfort on your stomach. “She loves you both very much.” You relaxed at the notion that Maria is happy with you taking purchase beside her precious son and carrying on the Stark family.

You know I never left you

‘Cause every road that leads to heaven is right beside you

“Y/N/N, have you ever thought of going back to work at the compound soon?” Tony suddenly mumbled into your tummy and made you look at him with a perplexed expression.

You couldn’t deny that the idea of being more of a stay at home mom-come-assistant was seeming increasingly more appealing the more Morgan grew and began to pick up speed with her crawling and tumbling about the place.

“Not exactly with Morgan trying to climb everything, no.” You sighed unbothered by the plan Tony wanted to present to you in a few seconds time. To your surprise you could feel a smile grow on your belly and made you pull away to look Tony in the eyes. “What are you thinking mister?”

“Let’s have another.” Tony blurted out like a child who had held a very big secret in for the longest while, a heartwarming smile still etched on his face and made a confused one break out along your own face.

So I can say

Hello my only one

“What?”

“Let’s have another baby.” Like that, Tony stood up and stared down at your smaller frame longingly, the distance between your faces starting to grow shorter and shorter the more you stared at him.

“Really? Like right now?” He only nodded at your slightly embarrassed yelp once a hand snaked inside your dressing gown and up his AC/DC t-shirt that you wore to bed, his hand ghosting your panties for effect.

Just like the morning sun

You keep on rising ‘till the sky knows your name

“Yeah, how about it?” Tony purred and began to shuffle you back a few steps to the relatively clean counter behind you, his hand not leaving your panties as it played curiously close to the growing heat a little below.

“What about the wedding though?” You yelped again at the contact of the cold counter touching your slightly exposed behind you, the thought of being too pregnant to attend your own wedding scaring you a little as Tony lifted you to sit on the counter; your panties vanishing over his shoulder as soon as you sat down.

“C’mon Y/N, a little bump wouldn’t kill nobody.” Tony whined and slid a finger into you for effect. ‘Might as well.’ You thought with a shrug and captured Tony’s lips passionately with your own, your answer dancing on his lips like a prayer.

Hello my only one

Remember who you are

Regardless to the fact that the two of you had been fucking for two hours straight, you realised as you lay on the office sofa in Tony’s arms that you weren’t tired at all and that Tony’s mom was as proud of him as you were of him.

From battling aliens, robots and his own teammates selflessly to being the greatest parent and mentor you knew he’d be to Morgan and the Spiderboy, Peter Parker, you onto prayed to god that his selfish cock of a father could see what Tony had done with his life other than build and kill people with his father’s stupid weapons.

“Hey Tony?” You mumbled into the speckles of black hair that decorated his chest like a reversal of a starry midnight sky. Wordlessly, he into hummed back in return and continued to draw patterns of your bare back.

“Did your mom say anything about being proud of you at all?” You lifted your head to look at the sleepy love of your life with question and watched him peel one eyelid open to look at you, the look of concern similar to the one that was etched in his mind from all those years ago when you first found out he was Iron Man.

No you’re not prefect

But you’re not your mistakes

“She did actually, yeah.” Tony thought back to the once terrifying dream he had with his mother and thought back to the smile she wore on her face; that ever proud smile that nobody could wipe off of her face as she looked at her ‘little’ boy.

“She may not have said it but when she looked at me, god did she look proud.” You smiled at the comfort that Tony finally got the recognitions deserved for his selflessness.

“Thank god for that.” You sighed and snuggled back into the warm hold of Tony’s arms in the invited silence and light of the undisturbed early morning, the both of you knowing that in under an hour you’d have to be up to see to your precious little girl - but for now, you laid and enjoyed the silence with the wish that Tony would get the love and happiness he deserved soon enough.

A/N : I know it’s a little different to the usual Chris Evans/ Steeb Rogers stuff but I still hope everyone enjoyed it!! If you can, again please leave feedback and tell me if it was good or nah (:

Maybe it was the way you could break the ice easily and non-uncomfortably between you and Tony when you first met that made him like you even more, he had to give it to you back then - he was an absolute douche of a mess after proper had left him for good.

In Tony’s eyes, you certainly didn’t compare to Pepper in any shape or form and he reminded you of that front the get-go; your only release being Happy as he drove you home from the torturous tower in the cold wet winter nights.

Both your new boss and your newly discovered second cousin hated your existence already and you couldn’t take it, so you snapped - more at Tony than Steve - and tearily swore you couldn’t deal with the comparison game and constant coldness much more.

It was that moment Tony had never seen such a beautiful woman before, tears streaming down her cheeks or not, you were just stunning; wounded but stunning. And much to his reputation, he told you that exactly and made you laugh pathetically that he found your ugly cry was beautiful.

From that day on, the rest was history and you soon became his fiancée after birthing him his first child a little over a year ago - a little after the Accords drama.

“And yes Y/N,” Tony turned and nestled himself into your touch, his head finding comfort on your stomach. “She loves you both very much.” You relaxed at the notion that Maria is happy with you taking purchase beside her precious son and carrying on the Stark family.

You know I never left you

‘Cause every road that leads to heaven is right beside you

“Y/N/N, have you ever thought of going back to work at the compound soon?” Tony suddenly mumbled into your tummy and made you look at him with a perplexed expression.

You couldn’t deny that the idea of being more of a stay at home mom-come-assistant was seeming increasingly more appealing the more Morgan grew and began to pick up speed with her crawling and tumbling about the place.

“Not exactly with Morgan trying to climb everything, no.” You sighed unbothered by the plan Tony wanted to present to you in a few seconds time. To your surprise you could feel a smile grow on your belly and made you pull away to look Tony in the eyes. “What are you thinking mister?”

“Let’s have another.” Tony blurted out like a child who had held a very big secret in for the longest while, a heartwarming smile still etched on his face and made a confused one break out along your own face.

So I can say

Hello my only one

“What?”

“Let’s have another baby.” Like that, Tony stood up and stared down at your smaller frame longingly, the distance between your faces starting to grow shorter and shorter the more you stared at him.

“Really? Like right now?” He only nodded at your slightly embarrassed yelp once a hand snaked inside your dressing gown and up his AC/DC t-shirt that you wore to bed, his hand ghosting your panties for effect.

Just like the morning sun

You keep on rising ‘till the sky knows your name

“Yeah, how about it?” Tony purred and began to shuffle you back a few steps to the relatively clean counter behind you, his hand not leaving your panties as it played curiously close to the growing heat a little below.

“What about the wedding though?” You yelped again at the contact of the cold counter touching your slightly exposed behind you, the thought of being too pregnant to attend your own wedding scaring you a little as Tony lifted you to sit on the counter; your panties vanishing over his shoulder as soon as you sat down.

“C’mon Y/N, a little bump wouldn’t kill nobody.” Tony whined and slid a finger into you for effect. ‘Might as well.’ You thought with a shrug and captured Tony’s lips passionately with your own, your answer dancing on his lips like a prayer.

Hello my only one

Remember who you are

Regardless to the fact that the two of you had been fucking for two hours straight, you realised as you lay on the office sofa in Tony’s arms that you weren’t tired at all and that Tony’s mom was as proud of him as you were of him.

From battling aliens, robots and his own teammates selflessly to being the greatest parent and mentor you knew he’d be to Morgan and the Spiderboy, Peter Parker, you onto prayed to god that his selfish cock of a father could see what Tony had done with his life other than build and kill people with his father’s stupid weapons.

“Hey Tony?” You mumbled into the speckles of black hair that decorated his chest like a reversal of a starry midnight sky. Wordlessly, he into hummed back in return and continued to draw patterns of your bare back.

“Did your mom say anything about being proud of you at all?” You lifted your head to look at the sleepy love of your life with question and watched him peel one eyelid open to look at you, the look of concern similar to the one that was etched in his mind from all those years ago when you first found out he was Iron Man.

No you’re not prefect

But you’re not your mistakes

“She did actually, yeah.” Tony thought back to the once terrifying dream he had with his mother and thought back to the smile she wore on her face; that ever proud smile that nobody could wipe off of her face as she looked at her ‘little’ boy.

“She may not have said it but when she looked at me, god did she look proud.” You smiled at the comfort that Tony finally got the recognitions deserved for his selflessness.

“Thank god for that.” You sighed and snuggled back into the warm hold of Tony’s arms in the invited silence and light of the undisturbed early morning, the both of you knowing that in under an hour you’d have to be up to see to your precious little girl - but for now, you laid and enjoyed the silence with the wish that Tony would get the love and happiness he deserved soon enough.

title: Avengers Academy
body:
Chapter 27:

When you think about time, it tends to go by fast. For Peter and Laura it’s going by faster than they like it to be. Prom is now 3 weeks away and they have nothing for it except what color they are going with.

They went with maroon since it’s a shade of red like in Peter’s suit. There’s only one woman who can help Laura get the job done, May. Tony promised to pay for both of them and help Peter look like a man. May gladly agreed to help Laura.

Today was an early release day for spring break so Laura and May had time to go shopping before Laura had to hop on the bus. Peter tried to tag along but they went with tradition like weddings when the date doesn’t see their date’s outfit till prom night.

Yeah he pulled the pouty face but none of them fell for it. On the car ride there May decide to bring up a topic she knew Laura can’t wiggle around. “Hey Laura, I know this may be much but I really have to ask for yours and Peter’s health, are you two having you know, sex?”

Laura was stunned by the question but couldn’t lie to the woman who she respects greatly. “Um. Yeah. Yeah we are.” She said getting nervous thinking that May was going to hate her for taking her nephew, who’s like a son to her, virginity.

“I’m not mad sweetie. I’m actually glad it was you. I wouldn’t want any of those other girls out there sleeping with her. They’re walking diseases.” Laura laughed knowing that it’s partially true. “Just promise me one thing?” May asked.

“Yeah what is it?” Laura replied. “You are using protection right? If you are please promise to keep using it.” Laura nodded her head. “Yeah of course. We’ve been using protection.” That was a lie but for the sake of May’s sanity she doesn’t need to know what Laura’s body is capable of.

They finally made it to the dress shop. The hostess at the front gladly started helping when she was given the size and color. They sat there patiently as the hostess came back with arms full of dresses. Laura tried them on.

That one is too puffy, this one is too slutty, that one is from 1450. Laura was starting to become discouraged. “May I don’t know what to do. That was the 10th dress.” Laura confided in May feeling hopeless as the woman left to get more dresses.

“Sweetie it’ll be alright. Just like a wedding dress, you’ll know when you find the right dress.” She hugged Laura. “I’m glad I chose you to help me. I’m sure Peter has told you some stuff about my past to you. You’re like a mom to me now and this entire experience with you is making me feel like my mom never died.” Laura’s words made May tear up.

“I’m glad I get to do this with you, you’re the daughter I never had.” After their moment of realizing how lucky they are, the woman comes back with 5 more dresses. A couple, though they were nice, didn’t fit at all.

Another one was a mix of too tight, too puffy, and too slutty. Somehow that’s a mix. The other didn’t scream Laura. It was the last one. The last one was it. This was the dress and when she walked out, May started to cry. Laura, with happy tears in her eyes said “this is it. This is the one.”

All three of them were excited. Laura was for once extremely excited about dresses, makeup and just being girly. “Peter’s jaw is going to drop when he sees you.” May said placing her hands on Laura’s shoulders and resting her chin on her hand.

She stared at the young girl in awe. Laura managed to bite her lip and make it look like it was out of admiration for the dress. What she was really thinking was “Yeah that’ll happen but by the end of the next it’ll be dropping on the floor”.

blog.name: long-live-the-many-fandoms
blog.title: Think. Dream. Believe. Dare.
blog.description: 22, Oregonian, lots of fandoms and random reblogs ♥️ PLL sideblog is: pll-imsodone-notreally

body:
Very Unpopular Opinion

I love Iron Man 3.

I think people get so hung up on the bad portrayal of The Mandarin that they forget about the rest of the film. We get some really incredible character development for Tony and Pepper. Tony deals with severe anxiety/ptsd after New York. Pepper meanwhile saves the day, as usual. We also get to see how strong she is, emotionally and physically, and we get to see more of who she is, as herself, and as a powerful woman, rather that just as Tony’s PA or girlfriend. I feel like this movie has so many great moments, it’s sad to me that people can’t seem to see them.
